title: Roit les Hypocrites "No gore pictures or threads will be allowed"
body:
"Remember that League of Legends, and therefore, the forums pertaining to the game, are also rated T, not 18+, ***so until blood and gore is allowed in Teen rated games***, it won't be accepted here. Blood is allowed, as long as it's not attached to anything offensive. (This rule is currently subject to change)."

http://youtu.be/qQOIyVEGa6o
Heads blows up, blood splatters all over the place, and the best part is the spine.
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Fboards.na.leagueoflegends.com%2Fapi%2Fembedly%2F1%2Fimage%2Fresize%3Furl%3Dhttp%253A%252F%252Fimgur.com%252FCpWixh7.jpg%26key%3Da45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b%26width%3D425&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425
